title: Display /status raw.icp0.io URL in HTTP instructions UI

requirements.summary: Add a new copyable/openable `/status` row to the HTTP instructions UI using the resolved backend canister ID.
acceptanceCriteria: When a backend canister ID is successfully resolved, the UI shows a `https://<CANISTER_ID>.raw.icp0.io/status` URL.
The `/status` row includes a copy button that copies the exact URL and provides the same temporary 'Copied!' feedback behavior as other endpoints.
The `/status` row includes an external-link button that opens the URL in a new tab.

file_operations.description: Add a derived `backendStatusUrl` (`https://${backendCanisterId}.raw.icp0.io/status`) and render a new endpoint row titled like the existing ones, with the same copy-to-clipboard behavior (including the temporary 'Copied!' state) and an open-in-new-tab external link. Use the existing shadcn/ui-based components already imported in this file (Card, Button, Alert, etc.) to keep controls consistent; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
